Trade/Device Name(s): JBAIDS Influenza A/H5 (Asian lineage) Detection Kit
Submitter Information: U.S. Army Medical Materiel Development Activity
Regulation Name(s): Reagents for detection of specific novel influenza A viruses
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Joint Biological Agent Identification and Diagnostic System (JBAIDS)
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Real-time reverse transcriptase polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for JBAIDS Influenza A/H5 (Asian lineage) Detection Kit, a qualitative rRT-PCR assay for detecting Influenza A/H5 viral RNA using the JBAIDS instrument.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of Influenza A/H5 (Asian lineage) viral RNA in nasopharyngeal or throat swab specimens to aid presumptive identification for epidemiological surveillance or clinical assessment, used with the JBAIDS instrument.
